<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Visio 365">d39336172f2495108968ea5ef699b6e7</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:8be2e5482ff819108968ea5ef699b696</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>post KFS data to record</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange() {
	
var ga= new GlideAjax('pinn_info');
ga.addParam("sysparm_name",'getInfo');
ga.addParam("sysparm_visio_365_kfs_account_number", 'visio_365_kfs_account_number');
ga.getXML(output);

function output(response)
{
var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
alert(answer);
var value = answer.split(",");
alert(value[0]);
//alert(value[1]);
g_form.setValue('visio_365_account_name',value[0]);
//g_form.setValue('room_number',value[1]);

}

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-15 16:59:00</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>e92bff882f3459108968ea5ef699b684</sys_id><sys_mod_count>19</sys_mod_count><sys_name>post KFS data to record</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_e92bff882f3459108968ea5ef699b684</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-15 20:48:01</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
